course_title: Creative Writing Honors: Honors in Playwriting
class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)

course_description: Offered every semester. Credit variable; may be repeated for a maximum of eight hours credit. Prerequisite: academic eligibility and approval of honors project director. A tutorial designed primarily to assist honors candidates in preparing their projects.
